name: Algo-Bot: code smarter not harder (Canceled)
blurb: Award winning 3D game in which you achieve your missions using Code Logic. No developers were harmed during the making of this game.

rewards.reward: -- INFINITE LOOP OF GRATITUDE -- \r\n\r\nExclusive wallpapers and our infinite gratitude to remind you that you helped making the dream come true ;)
